headerDisplay: Homebridge plugin to control Sonoff devices with OEM firmware.
footerDisplay: If you have any suggestions, please open an issue on [GitHub](https://github.com/bwp91/homebridge-ewelink-sonoff/issues).

countryCode.title: Country Code
countryCode.description: The telephone country code linked to your eWeLink account (without the +).

username.title: Username
username.description: The phone number or email address linked to your eWeLink account.

password.title: Password
password.description: The password for your eWeLink account.

debug.title: Debug Logging
debug.description: If enabled, more information will be added to the Homebridge log.

redactLogs.title: Log Redaction
redactLogs.description: If enabled, sensitive information will be hidden from the log. Note this is not a guarantee that everything will be redacted.

hideDevFromHB.title: Hide Devices
hideDevFromHB.description: A list of eWeLink devices to hide from Homebridge. For example '10009553c8' or multiple devices separated with a comma '10009553c8,10009553c9'.

hideFromHB.title: Hide Device Channels
hideFromHB.description: A list of device channels to hide from Homebridge. For example '10009553c8SW1' or multiple channels separated with a comma '10009553c8SW1,10009553c9SW2'.

sensorTimeLength.title: Motion Sensor Length
sensorTimeLength.description: The number of seconds which the sensor tile in the Home app will light up for if motion is detected by that sensor.

sensorTimeDifference.title: Motion Sensor Lag
sensorTimeDifference.description: An offset in seconds to cancel any motion detection notifications if they is a delay between the sensor detecting the motion and Homebridge receiving the notification.

groups.title: Groups
groups.description: You can group channels of multi-switch devices to simulate another HomeKit accessory instead of having each switch separately. Currently only blinds and garage doors are supported.

deviceId.title: Device ID
deviceId.description: Device ID from your eWeLink app (ten digits normally in the format 1000******).

operationTime.title: Time Up
operationTime.description: Total time in seconds to fully open/close blinds.

layout.title: Optional
layout.description: Only adjust these settings if you know what you are doing.
